item.title: Advent of Code 2016 in Julia
item.description: Last year I discovered by chance a code competition that happens in the month of December: The Advent of Code. This event consists of small puzzles release every day of December, up to the 25th. Which amounts to 25 problems! (I can do math). Last year I tried doing some on Bash, and latter switched to Julia, but never got to finish them. This year I decided to use Julia, because I want to test it for these general problems.
